[H3]BKR B-70 Modular Reinforced Bunker[h3]
The B-70 MRB is made from far sturdier materials than are Delvinâ€™s other modular structures. Constructed of reinforced, armorplast-faced ferrocrete, the MRB can be configured as a sealed bunker, open-topped fortification, or weapon emplacement, or as a protective structure to house power generators, shield generators, or other important base structures. The B-70 can hold six average-sized humanoids or one large piece of equipment like a turbolaser emplacement or shield generator. It provides 2 ranged defense to any individual or materiel inside.
